description:
A devious game of dodge ball costs the Straw Hats their archaeologist. Now, they`ll have to win an unusual uphill race to reclaim Robin and avoid losing another crew member!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dangai no Kessen! Daruma-san ga Koronda!
L`"uno due tre stella" dei pirati
Match sur la falaise ! 1, 2, 3, Soleil, Pirate !
Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!
مواجهة على الجرف! لعبة سقوط داروما-سان!
การแข่งที่หน้าผา! เกมเออีไอโอยู!
断崖の決戦! だるまさんがころんだ!
